name: Divine prophecy
description:
A simple and refreshing flying shooting game
with a plethora of special effects and excellent lighting, shadow, combustion, and explosion effects. It provides a very high level of visual enjoyment, allowing you to enjoy the fun of flying shooting in the game. You will navigate a spaceship in space, fighting against enemies from all directions while collecting resources as much as possible. With each upgrade, you will acquire more skills and weapons, and unleash your own powerful combat combo! The battle in the game is very refreshing, and players need to operate the spaceship to flexibly shuttle through the barrage.
While preserving themselves, they use the fierce artillery fire on the spaceship to harvest waves of surging enemies!
